steps.instruction: For around 18 portions:  Add all the ingredients into a bowl and mix thoroughly
Divide into 18 portions and ball up in your hands.  Then depress slightly onto the baking tray leaving room around each cookies for expansion in cooking.
Add to a lined baking tray and bake in a pre heated oven at 180 degrees C
Cook for 15 to 20 mins, until pale golden around the edges but soft in the middle (they continue cooking after coming out).
